title: card.usage.get Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Returns the Notecard's network usage statistics for cellular and WiFi transmissions.

mode.description: The time period to use for statistics. Must be one of:

sub-descriptions.description: All stats since the Notecard was activated.
Statistics for the last hour period.
Statistics for the last day period.
Statistics for the last 30 days period.

offset.description:
The number of time periods to look backwards, based on the specified `mode`.

To accurately determine the start of the calculated time period when using `offset`, use the `time` value of the response. Likewise, to calculate the end of the time period, add the `seconds` value to the `time` value.

annotations.title: note
annotations.description:
Usage data is updated by the Notecard at the end of each session. When operating in `continuous` mode, usage data is updated only after the interval specified by the [hub.set/duration argument](https://dev.blues.io/api-reference/notecard-api/hub-requests/#hub-set) elapses.

Please note that the `card.usage.get` API only applies to cellular and WiFi data, not LoRa or satellite (NTN).
